rows.label: qst000201_msg0002
rows.name:
We were just about to play
hide-'n'-seek!

rows.label: qst000201_msg0003
rows.name:
If friend need anything,
friend have to come later!

rows.label: qst000201_msg0004
rows.name:
Wait, friend maybe look like friend
want to play with us...?

rows.label: qst000201_msg0006
rows.name:
Well, if you insist, it'sokay!
We can all play together!

rows.label: qst000201_msg0010
rows.name:
Hiding area is anywhere on Goldmund
ground level!

rows.label: qst000201_msg0011
rows.name:
When we include higher floors,
the game goes on for days and days...

rows.label: qst000201_msg0013
rows.name:
Anyhow, when find everyone,
meet back here in Bower Lounge!

rows.label: qst000201_msg0015
rows.name:
Hiding area not big but we very good
at hiding! Friend no think it go easy!

rows.label: qst000201_msg0016
rows.name:
Yeah! We play hide-'n'-seek every day!
We'll hide like there's no tomorrow!

rows.label: qst000201_msg0017
rows.name:
Okay! We go hide now, so friend count
to hundred before looking, yes?
